Articles.Content: Apperantly, we are at about 98,700 threads! What will happen on Thread 10,000?
Real-life Kerbal Space Program convention? With Scott Manley as a guest speaker?

Well, for one, that stat is already way over #10,000 -- 98,700 is far larger than that. Secondly, we're already past #100,000 -- if you look at thread ID numbers, we're at 110,607 as of this thread (see the number in the thread URL).

There are non-publicly-visible threads as well as archived threads, which as far as I know do not contribute to the public thread count.
can we search threads by thread number somehow and find out what the 100,000th was(providing its visible)?
Thread 100,000, enjoy (If you know German)

Thread 100,000, enjoy (If you know German)

I would break the good news to them, but it's a foreign thread.

Someone already did, some months back.

If you'd rather celebrate something in English, try [thread=99999]thread #99,999[/thread].

I would break the good news to them, but it's a foreign thread.

We must learn German to google translate!!!!

We must learn German to google translate!!!!

Thread 100,000 was google translated by me.

Basically, some guy was having problems with KW Rocketry and Kethane because they were crashing his game.

Then, people were telling him later in the thread that he should get Active Texture Reduction because they thought the problem might lie in the RAM.

Also, Sun, a player with the title of Banned, pointed out in English that the German thread was the 100,000th thread.

Then, people were telling him later in the thread that he should get Active Texture Reduction because they thought the problem might lie in the RAM.

Sun got banned?>??? I wondered why i hadn't seen him...
